ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would not only recommend the class, I believe it should be a required class for all film students - and not only because it is one of the few 'media' classes on campus that doesn't only focus on film.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As somebody who studies (and hopes to continue to study) popular cinema, repetition is a key theme in my work. I now am armed with a multitude of new approaches to this theme, many of which I intend to use in future research.
It allowed me to approach classic texts in a new way, and to read some canonical things that I had not yet had a chance to read.
